data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Batken, Kyrgyzstan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batken, Kyrgyzstan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Batken. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.section_summary: On average, 105 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Batken, Kyrgyzstan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give the 1,297 believers in the state of Batken the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Batken access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, I pray that the Tajik people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tajik people know you.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Batken to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Batken to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Batken to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
